summary: Hotel management app with admin, hotel, and guest roles. Current focus: restore/repair admin token (invite) generation visibility, ensure room photos propagate to guest/admin browse views with working delete, and add two-way ratings/reviews (guestâ†”hotel). User also requests redeploy and a published link due to changes not appearing.
architectural_notes: User requested not to change or disrupt features that are already working normally; limit changes to explicitly requested areas.
known_issues: Deploy/build instability: app generation/deploy failed at times, and user reports changes not reflected after a successful draft build; may indicate deploy not applied or caching/version mismatch.

existing_features.title: Add an Admin Panel section that helps admins verify whether the latest deployment is actually being served by the browser, by prominently showing the current BUILD_VERSION and basic runtime info (current URL/origin, detected network/canister host if available) with a one-click copy action.

Extend the existing deploy/publish guidance UI so that it explicitly tells users how to obtain the platform Publish URL/Open App link, and includes cache-busting steps when changes are not visible (hard refresh instructions and an in-app reload button). All user-facing text must be in English.
Ensure the application visibly changes its build identifier whenever a new release is produced by updating the frontend build version constant so users can confirm they are on the latest version.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix admin generate token/invite code flow so generated token results and usage history (Active/Used Invite Codes) display correctly for a given Principal ID.
Fix room photo visibility so uploads from hotel account appear in guest and admin browse views, and re-enable working delete photo functionality for hotels.
Add two-way rating & review system: guests can rate/review hotels and hotels can rate/review guests.
